item.title: [onc] Night's Whisper
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [onc] Ichor Rats
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Rat

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

item.title: [onc] Caress of Phyrexia
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.

item.title: [onc] Painful Truths
item.description:
Sorcery

Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

item.title: [onc] Plague Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect Horror

Flying

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [onc] Hate Mirage
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose up to two target creatures you don't control. For each of those creatures, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [onc] Dragonmaster Outcast
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

item.title: [onc] Chain Reaction
item.description:
Sorcery

Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

item.title: [onc] Siege-Gang Commander
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [onc] Loyal Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Haste

Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Legion Warboss
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Soldier

Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. That token gains haste until end of turn and attacks this combat if able.

item.title: [onc] Hordeling Outburst
item.description:
Sorcery

Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

item.title: [onc] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [onc] Mycosynth Fiend
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Mycosynth Fiend gets +1/+1 for each poison counter your opponents have.

item.title: [onc] Evolution Sage
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [onc] Carrion Call
item.description:
Instant

Create two 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature tokens with infect. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

item.title: [onc] Blight Mamba
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Snake

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

{1}{G}: Regenerate Blight Mamba.

item.title: [onc] Viridian Corrupter
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Shaman

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

item.title: [onc] Scavenging Ooze
item.description:
Creature — Ooze

{G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [onc] Phyrexian Swarmlord
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect Horror

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 green Phyrexian Insect creature token with infect for each poison counter your opponents have.

item.title: [onc] Noxious Revival
item.description:
Instant

({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner's library.

item.title: [onc] Adriana, Captain of the Guard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

item.title: [onc] Merciless Eviction
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Exile all artifacts.

• Exile all creatures.

• Exile all enchantments.

• Exile all planeswalkers.

item.title: [onc] Jor Kadeen, the Prevailer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Metalcraft — Creatures you control get +3/+0 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [onc] Heroic Reinforcements
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Until end of turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste. (They can attack and {T} this turn.)

item.title: [onc] Culling Ritual
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.

item.title: [onc] Boros Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Assemble the Legion
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

item.title: [onc] Rip Apart
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Rip Apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [onc] Putrefy
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [onc] Mortify
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [onc] Moldervine Reclamation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [onc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Chromatic Lantern
item.description:
Artifact

Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [onc] Boros Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {R}{W}.

item.title: [onc] Ichorclaw Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Myr

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Whenever Ichorclaw Myr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Grafted Exoskeleton
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

Whenever Grafted Exoskeleton becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent.

Equip {2}

item.title: [onc] Golgari Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {B}{G}.

item.title: [onc] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [onc] Contagion Clasp
item.description:
Artifact

When Contagion Clasp enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Plague Myr
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Myr

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [onc] Myr Battlesphere
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Myr Construct

When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

item.title: [onc] Mind Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Mask of Memory
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [onc] Loxodon Warhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink.

Equip {3}

item.title: [onc] Idol of Oblivion
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

{8}, {T}, Sacrifice Idol of Oblivion: Create a 10/10 colorless Eldrazi creature token.

item.title: [onc] Trailblazer's Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)

Equip {2}

item.title: [onc] Talisman of Conviction
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Talisman of Conviction deals 1 damage to you.
